properties.entry: INSERT /*com.devs.honddoni.admin.model.dao.AdminDao#insertNoticePost()*/ INTO TBL_POST A ( A.POST_NO ,A.POST_NAME ,A.POST_CONTENTS ,A.POST_CATEGORY ,A.POST_MEMBER_NO ,A.POST_MEETINGDATE ,A.POST_MEETINGTIME ,A.POST_WRITINGDATE ,A.POST_WRITINGTIME ,A.LOCAL_CODE ,A.CATEGORY_CODE ,A.POST_DEL_STATUS ,A.POST_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE ) VALUES ( SEQ_POST_NO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,? ,? ,NULL ,NULL ,DEFAULT ,NULL )
SELECT P.* FROM TBL_POST P WHERE P.POST_CATEGORY = '자유' AND P.POST_NO = ?
